title: Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Hoshi ni Negai wo
synopsis: The Konica Minolta "Tenkuu" Planetarium in Tokyo Skytree Town will run a Chibi Maruko-chan planetarium show from July 18 to August 31. The show, titled " Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Hoshi ni Negai wo " (Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Wish Upon a Star), celebrates the 25th anniversary of the Chibi Maruko-chan anime since it first aired in January 1990. (Source: ANN)
